title: Image Change
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>What’s wrong, Kanan? You’re staring at the mirror so intensely......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, Eli-chan. Umm, I was thinking about changing my image.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Changing your image?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah. Like, what if I were to change my hairstyle? I’ve had a ponytail since I was little.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Your hairstyle, huh...... So you want to cut it short?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Wouldn’t that be weird?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What if you had twintails like Nico?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It doesn’t seem easy to keep them at equal lengths. Nico-chan is amazing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hey, all you’re doing is complaining. You really prefer your ponytail, don’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, you can tell? If it didn’t seem so weird, I’d cut it immediately!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
